tool_description: Use Stable Diffusion with this optimized API from Hotpot.ai. This image generator provides access to the standard Stable Diffusion text to image model while adding enhancements to make integration faster and easier. As a result, you can produce stunning art and images in seconds with this simple integration. Demo: https://hotpot.ai/art-generator
name: Stable Diffusion - Optimized
title: Stable Diffusion - Optimized

api_list.name: Stable Diffusion API
api_list.description:
This [Stable Diffusion API](https://hotpot.ai/stable-diffusion-api) from Hotpot.ai provides access to the standard Stable Diffusion text-to-image model while adding enhancements to make integration faster and easier. With this optimized image generator, you can produce stunning art and images in seconds.

Demo: [AI Art Generator](https://hotpot.ai/art-generator)

required_parameters.name: inputText
required_parameters.default: The description of the graphic to be created. Please be specific.
